series_description: This series documents contacts regarding, and evaluations of, potential Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) compliance issues pertaining to state-owned or -operated facilities and/or state-owned infrastructure. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, evaluations, reports, and assessments.
Documents the supervision of custodial activities but not limited to assignments, work responsibilities, checklists, inspections, reports and other related documents except fiscal and payroll.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Verifies the completion of required elevator inspections.

Documents the supervision of grounds keeping activities including but not limited to assignments, work responsibilities, checklists, inspections, reports and other related documents except fiscal and payroll.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the inspection of state or agency owned property and installed equipment not covered by another records series. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspections, photographs, recommended actions, and follow-up notes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents the installation, maintenance, service and history of building installed equipment.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: Documents the assignment, control and use of parking spaces.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents requests for building repair or service work, including call records, work orders, actions and other related documentation except on installed equipment.
Documents the assignment, control and use of offices, floor space, rooms or other facilities within assigned buildings, excluding fiscal records.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Documents the manufacturer's/vendor's warranty to replace and/or repair defective materials or equipment.

series_title: Construction Stormwater Permit Compliance and Inspections: Record Copy
series_description: This series documents the agency's record copy of responsibilities pertaining to compliance with Stormwater General and Individual Permits permitted by the Virginia Department of Environmental Quality. This series may include, but is not limited to, inspections, correspondence, and compliance documentation.
Documents preparation and filing of reports required by Virginia Administrative Code
Documents the authorized and proper disposal of medical waste as required by Virginia Administrative Code

series_title: Environmental Protection: Other Waste Disposal Records
series_description: Documents any activities related to waste disposal not otherwise listed on this schedule.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Environmental Protection: Title V Air Emissions Permits
series_description: This series documents participation in the Title V Operating Permits Program as part of the Clean Air Act. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications, air permits, maintenance and monitoring reports, improvement plans, and supporting documentation
Documents the authorized and proper transportation of hazardous waste as required by Virginia Administrative Code
Documents the status of equipment in use by the agency.

series_title: Equipment Maintenance: Repair and Service Records
series_description: Documents the repair and service history of nonautomotive and non-installed equipment owned by the agency..
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_title: Equipment Maintenance: Technical Reference and Maintenance Publications
series_description: Collects technical reference material needed to use, maintain, supply and repair agency owned equipment.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents the manufacturer's/vendor's warranty to replace and/or repair defective equipment.

series_title: Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management: Certifications (Record Copy)
series_description: This series documents certification of persons in accordance
legal_citation: 9VAC25-850 -Virginia Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Certification Regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to, certificates and correspondence.

series_description: This series documents the temporary transfer of the use of agency property to another agency or the lease of agency property to private individuals or entities, agency recommendations and Governor approvals. This series may include, but is not limited to, agreements, leases, and correspondence

series_title: Real Property: Construction As-Built Plans, Specification, Drawings, Plans and Maps
series_description: Documents the end result of agency construction and renovation projects. Refer to the Construction and Professional Services Manual, issued by the Department of General Services, for further instructions.
Documents agency actions in supervision of construction or renovation contracts.
Documents preliminary plans, drawings and for construction or renovation projects

series_title: Real Property: Construction Project Requests, Justifications, and Rankings
series_description: Documents the agencies actions to obtain authorization and funding for Capital Outlay Projects
Documents ownership of real property.

series_description: Documents ownership of real property.
Documents the leasing of real property for agency use.
Documents the reporting and disposal of surplus real property
Documents creation of special purpose mailing lists for routine distribution of printed materials.

series_description: Documents the routine management of an agency printing/duplication shop.

series_title: Reproduction: Printing/Duplication Job Orders Requestor Copy
series_description: Documents agency requests for printing/duplication, either internal or external, excluding purchase orders.

series_description: Documents work requested of and/or completed by an agency run printing or duplication shop. Series includes printing order, planning files, receipt documents and other supporting material. Refer to General Records Retention and Disposition Schedule No. GS-102, Fiscal Records for retention guidelines on payment records.
Documents the filing of claims by the agency or against the agency's insurers.
Documents the insurance status of an agency.

This series documents visitor access to specific buildings, departments, rooms, or areas. This series may include, but is not limited to: access lists, sign-in sheets, logs, registers, screenings, instruction books, and emergency contacts.
retention_statement: 6 Months after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Documents the issue or delivery of supplies to users within the agency.

series_description: Documents the receipt of goods from vendors and/or common carriers.

series_description: Documents the on-hand balances, status, usage, issuance and reorder of stocks of supplies stored for issue by the stockroom or warehouse.
